author: Peter Wright
content: My 96 year old father, still living on his own, sharp as a tack, watched her being launched from the bank opposite John Browns.

author: Willy
content: As to the heating. The may as well cover the roof area with solar panels and install mini-split air conditioning. They can use the steam piping to route the hosing required for the minisplits

author: Jean-Pierre Declemy
content:
I was just about to suggest the same solution as @Willy
Fill in the cofferdam with landfill garbage topped off with rocks and cement to provide a new parking area.

author: Willy
content:
Gads. The headaches of trying to light one of the queen mary’s boilers alone in southern california is astronimical what with CARB restrictions.
